rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective. 'improve' is a positive description.
The segment uses neutral language without high-potency verbs or potent metaphors.
'agreed', 'has to learn', 'will soon be collecting' are not moderate verbs indicating impact.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports ongoing review without explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation without an explicit calming cue.
States 'We are continuing to review data and methodologies that may improve our public health surveillance', describing ongoing work to improve capability without active reassurance.
